Description:
-
Forced - arcade shooter / RPG with puzzle elements and tactics designed to play either alone or in co-op for up to four players. You - slaves who are sent to the most brutal of the gladiator school ever invented. You are destined to fight in gladiatorial combat, in order to finally win their freedom. You will encounter deadly tests and giant monsters, but Balfus your Spiritual Guide will guide you on the path to recognition.
-
Features:
-
" Gladiator Campaign: 25 arenas and 5 bosses 
" Four unique characters, each with 16 abilities that you have to discover 
" The emphasis on your skill and dexterity. Attacks all enemies can be avoided. What way? You have to figure it out yourself! 
" Spiritual Guide - one member of your team, which players take turns kotroliruyut to get advantage over the enemy 
" mode "Arena Survival" (later to be supplemented with other modes) 
" combat system, based on the labels. Put a label on the enemies base attacks, to prepare them for specific attacks destructive force that will spend you or your allies.
-
